commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance list
commands.summary: List the SAP Central Services Instance resource for the given Virtual Instance for SAP solutions resource.

commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance show
commands.summary: Show the SAP Central Services Instance resource.

commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance start
commands.summary: Starts the SAP Central Services Instance.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-central-instance start [--central-instance-name]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--sap-virtual-instance-name]
                                        [--start-vm {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--subscription]

commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance stop
commands.summary: Stops the SAP Central Services Instance.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-central-instance stop [--central-instance-name]
                                       [--deallocate-vm {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--sap-virtual-instance-name]
                                       [--subscription]

commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance update
commands.summary: Update the SAP Central Services Instance resource. This can be used to update tags on the resource.
commands.syntax:
az workloads sap-central-instance update [--central-instance-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--sap-virtual-instance-name]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--tags]
examples: az workloads sap-central-instance update --sap-virtual-instance-name <VIS name> -g <Resource-group-name> -n <ResourceName> --tags tag=test tag2=test2

commands.name: az workloads sap-central-instance wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
